originalText.text: So let me star by saying tty at the program is a fraud. The past two years I have lived in one of the worst buildings in my life. Continuous floods, current mold, water bugs and the ‚Äúwonderful‚Äù people at this dump say they‚Äôre not responsible. The city has been aware for two years and has done nothing. We lost everything, they didn‚Äôt even care about moving us somewhere until repairs could be made. We have lived in mold for two year beware of ms slaughter who is the alleged president . I will also be contacting the bbb there has to be illegal activity going on in their program to allow this type of living . Worse than a shelter. The city of ny sent not one but two building inspectors just to not test for mold or send the health department IM SUING EVERYONE! We are still here the property manager Daniel and his boss sol are neglectful they said they‚Äôre not responsible for what happened we will see when seven on your side shows up.

originalText.text:
Go on Youtube and type : "Odyssey House" You will see my inhouse video of when I used to live there from January  2013 to July 2015 I was a victim of Housing Discrimination / Retaliation / Harassment by Odyssey House staff members, Management, Directors, Whenever I spoke up against abuse or neglect Odyssey House staff members /management try to Hospitalize me, I was Hospitalized for 9 days. As a result of complaints made in good faith to  goverment agencies I faced unlawful eviction by odyssey  House property manager Janice Glenn slaughter and I started a Federal Lawsuit Docket No. 15 Civ. 3188
We're I won a temporary restraint order against Odyssey House and NYS Office of Mental Health was forced to relocated as a safety transfer reasonable accommodation (ADA)

originalText.text: The worst non profit organization ever. Staff are negligent towards the tenants that live within these odyssey houses. They have no respect. They always violate our rights here. The president Peter provet of odyssey house inc. does not care about us here. He only cares about the money. I told peter provet that I was going through mental abuse and he told me he couldn‚Äôt help me. I was shocked üò≥. This place is not good for people with mental health. Odyssey house inc is the council of the wicked.
